snippet.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy - PS4 & PS5 Volume 1 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The time has come for you to join the Noisy Fairy Squadron, and prepare for war.

The 1st Volume of Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy is available now on PS4 & PS5!

You can also get the Deluxe Edition, which includes all three Volumes!

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu

#Gundam #CodeFairy #MobileSuit
